name: com.microsoft.mixedreality.webrtc
description:
MixedReality-WebRTC provides multi-platform support for real-time audio/video/data communication using WebRTC, including for UWP devices like HoloLens 1 and HoloLens 2.

Easy to integrate into any project, MixedReality-WebRTC offers components to manage a peer connection, to capture audio from a local microphone, to capture video from a local webcam, to render some remote video into a Unity texture, and to access remote audio as a Unity AudioSource object.

Convenience components are also provided for typical uses like capturing the Unity scene content as rendered by any Unity Camera, and stream it as a video.

Advanced users can access the raw remote audio and video data via a set of callbacks, and inject their own custom audio and video data into a WebRTC track to be sent to the remote peer.

Some samples showing those usages are provided in a separate package "MixedReality-WebRTC Samples".
